items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!
items.body: Love how the dress is soft and comfortable. The color is like the pictures and it’s not see through! Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Super comfortable. True to size. Thick sweater like material. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Love it comfortable warm and fits my body like a glove ! Got a size large Read more
items.author: Amanda Chim

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Huge, Awkward, Crap
items.body: Extremely fricking long and big, awkward, shoulders won’t stay down. Save your money and go into an actual store. I’m tired of this cheap dropship crap. Unwearable. Read more
items.author: Peaches

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was such a hit for my birthday!
items.body: Was such a hit for my birthday! Read more
items.author: Jordan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Dress looks exactly like the photo. It’s on the thinner side. I ordered the apricot color, but had to return bc it looked more like khaki. I’ll order it in white and cross my fingers it’s not see through. (Most whites are) however the apricot was not see through. Read more
items.author: T. Lepree

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking dress, very sexy!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress, I feel really sexy in it. It is made of a sweater material and hugs your body without being too clingy. The material is well- made and so far, after wearing it twice, it does not seem to lose its shape. It, the material, moves with your body and doesn't ride up when you walk.. so awesome. I got it in a large and it fits great. There are no pockets in the dress and it ends right above the knee, mid thigh. I can tell my husband likes how I look in it from his face when I have it on. Read more
items.author: Wave Mc

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, White, Blue, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
